trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: We’ve made bug fixes, UI adjustments and other performance improvements to make your experience using VPN even better.
trans-unit.target: Rydym wedi cywiro rhai gwallau, addasu'r rhyngwyneb a gwella perfformiad i wneud Mozilla VPN yn well byth.

trans-unit.note: Standard text in a composer block
trans-unit.source: Thank you for installing the latest version!
trans-unit.target: Diolch am osod y fersiwn diweddaraf!

trans-unit.source: You’re using the latest version of Mozilla VPN.
trans-unit.target: Rydych yn defnyddio'r fersiwn diweddaraf o Mozilla VPN.
Rydych wedi diweddaru i Mozilla VPN 2.24
